name: CreateServiceRequest
description:
Create a service request in Freshservice.

Use this tool to submit a new service request in Freshservice. It facilitates the creation of service requests by sending the necessary information to Freshservice's system.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the item to be requested. It must be an integer.

value_schema.description: the id of the item that needs to requested

parameters.name: requester_email
parameters.description: The email address of the person making the service request.

value_schema.description: the email id of the requester

parameters.name: item_quantity
parameters.description: The number of units of the item needed by the requester. Defaults to 1 if not specified.

value_schema.description: The number of units of the item needed by the requester. By default it is 1.

parameters.name: user_requested_for_email
parameters.description: Email address of the user for whom the service is requested.

value_schema.description: the email id of the user for whom this is requested.

parameters.name: custom_fields_json
parameters.description: A JSON object containing custom fields related to a Freshservice entity. This allows for additional data specific to the request.

value_schema.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.description: the id of the item that needs to requested

value_schema.description: the id of the item that needs to requested

parameters.name: quantity

value_schema.description: The number of units of the item needed by the requester. By default it is 1.

parameters.description: the email id of the requester

value_schema.description: the email id of the requester

parameters.description: the email id of the user for whom this is requested.

value_schema.description: the email id of the user for whom this is requested.

parameters.name: custom_fields
parameters.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

value_schema.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity
